entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5 except low plus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5 except low plus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
